about_the_game:
Harnessing the raw power of Unreal Engine 5, Gone Camping! is a small indie First-Person bow & arrow shooter focused on adventure and open-world exploration. Inspired by games like Zelda, Skyrim, and Far Cry. You are free to chill and camp in the great outdoors, take a hike, go hunting/fishing, drive an assortment of vehicles, or bravely dive into caves and dungeons filled with dangerous puzzles, creatures, and undead warriors.




Setup camp to establish your next base of operations. Cook up a refreshing meal at the campfire to heal up, then rest in your tent to save your progress and progress the time of day. From here you can go for a hike, discover a new dungeon to challenge with your Bow & Arrow and unlock new items, or kick simply back and relax with a lo-fi beat chill-mode to enjoy the nature that surrounds you. The choice is yours!

Inspired by games like Zelda, Skyrim, and Far Cry. You are free to chill and camp in the great outdoors, take a hike, go hunting/fishing, drive an assortment of vehicles, or bravely dive into caves and dungeons filled with dangerous puzzles, creatures, and undead warriors.

From here you can go for a hike, discover a new dungeon to challenge with your Bow & Arrow and unlock new items, or kick simply back and relax with a lo-fi beat chill-mode to enjoy the nature that surrounds you. name: Gone Camping!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 2600X, Intel Core i7-6800K
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon RX 5600 XT, NVIDIA GeForce 1080
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: SSD Recommended
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 5600X, Intel i5-10600K
  • Memory: 32 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon RX 6800, NVIDIA GeForce RTX 3080
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: SSD Recommended

short_description: Camping and adventure await you and your Bow & Arrow! Solve puzzles and fight monsters in dungeons or relax and hike the open world. There's fun and excitement for everyone when you're Gone Camping!
